title: SENIOR PHP DEVELOPERS (Magento)
description:
KEY RESPONSIBILITIES
•	Participating in ecommerce development projects using Magento
•	Be active in self-research and sharing solutions for complicated technical problem in Magento
•	Carrying out assigned tasks to meet all deadlines and delivered with quality results.
•	Contributing in designing & implement features to meet customer’s requirements & deadlines.
•	Working directly with clients to resolve ambiguities, finalize requirements and ensure technical deliverables meet business expectations
requirements:
Must have

•	Good command of communication in English.
•	At least 3 years of working experience in web development using PHP and popular PHP frameworks and toolsets
•	Good working knowledge with Magento framework, Elastic Search, Solr, etc.
•	Having strong knowledge and good working with common source code control management (Git)
•	Has coding standard, code structure thinking, best practice
•	Experience in working in Agile development team
